verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <S%H1961><s%> came בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֗י <S%H7992><s%> Now it came to pass on the third וַתִּלְבַּ֤שׁ <S%H3847><s%> put on אֶסְתֵּר֙ <S%H635><s%> that Esther מַלְכ֔וּת <S%H4438><s%> [her] royal וַֽתַּעֲמֹ֞ד <S%H5975><s%> [apparel] and stood בַּחֲצַ֤ר <S%H2691><s%> court בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> house הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> of the king's הַפְּנִימִ֔ית <S%H6442><s%> in the inner נֹ֖כַח <S%H5227><s%> over against בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king's וְ֠הַמֶּלֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and the king יוֹשֵׁ֞ב <S%H3427><s%> sat עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כִּסֵּ֤א <S%H3678><s%> throne מַלְכוּתוֹ֙ <S%H4438><s%> upon his royal בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house הַמַּלְכ֔וּת <S%H4438><s%> in the royal נֹ֖כַח <S%H5227><s%> over against פֶּ֥תַח <S%H6607><s%> the gate הַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> of the house

וַיְהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> become כִרְא֨וֹת <S%H7200><s%> saw הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And it was so when the king אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶסְתֵּ֣ר <S%H635><s%> Esther הַמַּלְכָּ֗ה <S%H4436><s%> the queen עֹמֶ֙דֶת֙ <S%H5975><s%> standing בֶּֽחָצֵ֔ר <S%H2691><s%> in the court נָשְׂאָ֥ה <S%H5375><s%> [that] she obtained חֵ֖ן <S%H2580><s%> favour בְּעֵינָ֑יו <S%H5869><s%> in his sight וַיּ֨וֹשֶׁט <S%H3447><s%> held out הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and the king לְאֶסְתֵּ֗ר <S%H635><s%> to Esther אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שַׁרְבִ֤יט <S%H8275><s%> sceptre הַזָּהָב֙ <S%H2091><s%> the golden אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּיָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> that [was] in his hand וַתִּקְרַ֣ב <S%H7126><s%> drew near אֶסְתֵּ֔ר <S%H635><s%> So Esther וַתִּגַּ֖ע <S%H5060><s%> and touched בְּרֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> the top הַשַּׁרְבִֽיט׃ <S%H8275><s%> of the sceptre ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said לָהּ֙ הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> to her What לָּ֖ךְ אֶסְתֵּ֣ר <S%H635><s%> Esther הַמַּלְכָּ֑ה <S%H4436><s%> unto her What wilt thou queen וּמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> to her What בַּקָּשָׁתֵ֛ךְ <S%H1246><s%> request עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against חֲצִ֥י <S%H2677><s%> thee to the half הַמַּלְכ֖וּת <S%H4438><s%> of the kingdom וְיִנָּ֥תֵֽן <S%H5414><s%> shall be given לָֽךְ׃

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> answered אֶסְתֵּ֔ר <S%H635><s%> And Esther אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king ט֑וֹב <S%H2895><s%> If [it seem] good יָב֨וֹא <S%H935><s%> come הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> let the king וְהָמָן֙ <S%H2001><s%> and Haman הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמִּשְׁתֶּ֖ה <S%H4960><s%> unto the banquet אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> i עָשִׂ֥יתִי <S%H6213><s%> that I have prepared לֽוֹ׃

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Then the king מַהֲרוּ֙ <S%H4116><s%> to make haste אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָמָ֔ן <S%H2001><s%> Cause Haman לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <S%H6213><s%> that he may do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> hath said אֶסְתֵּ֑ר <S%H635><s%> as Esther וַיָּבֹ֤א <S%H935><s%> came הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> So the king וְהָמָ֔ן <S%H2001><s%> and Haman אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמִּשְׁתֶּ֖ה <S%H4960><s%> to the banquet אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which עָשְׂתָ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> had prepared אֶסְתֵּֽר׃ <S%H635><s%> that Esther

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king לְאֶסְתֵּר֙ <S%H635><s%> unto Esther בְּמִשְׁתֵּ֣ה <S%H4960><s%> at the banquet הַיַּ֔יִן <S%H3196><s%> of wine מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What שְּׁאֵלָתֵ֖ךְ <S%H7596><s%> is your petition וְיִנָּ֣תֵֽן <S%H5414><s%> shall be granted לָ֑ךְ וּמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> and what בַּקָּשָׁתֵ֛ךְ <S%H1246><s%> request עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against חֲצִ֥י <S%H2677><s%> to half הַמַּלְכ֖וּת <S%H4438><s%> of the kingdom וְתֵעָֽשׂ׃ <S%H6213><s%> it shall be performed
וַתַּ֥עַן <S%H6030><s%> Then answered אֶסְתֵּ֖ר <S%H635><s%> Esther וַתֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> and said שְׁאֵלָתִ֖י <S%H7596><s%> My petition וּבַקָּשָׁתִֽי׃ <S%H1246><s%> and my request

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if מָצָ֨אתִי <S%H4672><s%> If I have found חֵ֜ן <S%H2580><s%> favour בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> and if עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> the king ט֔וֹב <S%H2895><s%> and if it please לָתֵת֙ <S%H5414><s%> to grant אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁאֵ֣לָתִ֔י <S%H7596><s%> my petition וְלַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <S%H6213><s%> and to perform אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בַּקָּשָׁתִ֑י <S%H1246><s%> my request יָב֧וֹא <S%H935><s%> come הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> let the king וְהָמָ֗ן <S%H2001><s%> and Haman אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמִּשְׁתֶּה֙ <S%H4960><s%> to the banquet אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which אֶֽעֱשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> that I shall prepare לָהֶ֔ם וּמָחָ֥ר <S%H4279><s%> to morrow אֶֽעֱשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> for them and I will do כִּדְבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> hath said הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> as the king

וַיֵּצֵ֤א <S%H3318><s%> forth הָמָן֙ <S%H2001><s%> Haman בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> that day הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he שָׂמֵ֖חַ <S%H8056><s%> joyful וְט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> and with a glad לֵ֑ב <S%H3820><s%> heart וְכִרְאוֹת֩ <S%H7200><s%> saw הָמָ֨ן <S%H2001><s%> but when Haman אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> מָרְדֳּכַ֜י <S%H4782><s%> Mordecai בְּשַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> in the king's וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not קָם֙ <S%H6965><s%> that he stood not up וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> or זָ֣ע <S%H2111><s%> nor moved מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> before וַיִּמָּלֵ֥א <S%H4390><s%> was full הָמָ֛ן <S%H2001><s%> for him he עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> against מָרְדֳּכַ֖י <S%H4782><s%> against Mordecai חֵמָֽה׃ <S%H2534><s%> of indignation

וַיִּתְאַפַּ֣ק <S%H662><s%> refrained הָמָ֔ן <S%H2001><s%> Nevertheless Haman וַיָּב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> himself and when he came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his בֵּית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> home וַיִּשְׁלַ֛ח <S%H7971><s%> he sent וַיָּבֵ֥א <S%H935><s%> and called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֹהֲבָ֖יו <S%H157><s%> for his friends וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זֶ֥רֶשׁ <S%H2238><s%> and Zeresh אִשְׁתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H802><s%> his wife

וַיְסַפֵּ֨ר <S%H5608><s%> told לָהֶ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> Then הָמָ֛ן <S%H2001><s%> And Haman אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כְּב֥וֹד <S%H3519><s%> them of the glory עָשְׁר֖וֹ <S%H6239><s%> of his riches וְרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> and the multitude בָּנָ֑יו <S%H1121><s%> of his children וְאֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> where גִּדְּל֤וֹ <S%H1431><s%> had promoted הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> and all [the things] wherein the king וְאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> and how נִשְּׂא֔וֹ <S%H5375><s%> him and how he had advanced עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> above הַשָּׂרִ֖ים <S%H8269><s%> him above the princes וְעַבְדֵ֥י <S%H5650><s%> and servants הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> of the king

וַיֹּאמֶר֮ <S%H559><s%> said הָמָן֒ <S%H2001><s%> Haman אַ֣ף <S%H637><s%> also לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no הֵבִיאָה֩ <S%H935><s%> did let no man come in אֶסְתֵּ֨ר <S%H635><s%> moreover Yea Esther הַמַּלְכָּ֧ה <S%H4436><s%> the queen עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> with the king אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמִּשְׁתֶּ֥ה <S%H4960><s%> unto the banquet אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֖תָה <S%H6213><s%> that she had prepared כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo אוֹתִ֑י <S%H853><s%> וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also לְמָחָ֛ר <S%H4279><s%> but myself and to morrow אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am קָֽרוּא־ <S%H7121><s%> am I invited לָ֖הּ עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> her with הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> unto her also with the king

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all זֶ֕ה <S%H2088><s%> of this אֵינֶ֥נּוּ <S%H369><s%> does not שֹׁוֶ֖ה <S%H7737><s%> Yet all this availeth לִ֑י בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every עֵ֗ת <S%H6256><s%> me nothing so long as אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> I רֹאֶה֙ <S%H7200><s%> I see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מָרְדֳּכַ֣י <S%H4782><s%> Mordecai הַיְּהוּדִ֔י <S%H3064><s%> the Jew יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> sitting בְּשַׁ֥עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> at the king's

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said לוֹ֩ זֶ֨רֶשׁ <S%H2238><s%> Zeresh אִשְׁתּ֜וֹ <S%H802><s%> his wife וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֹֽהֲבָ֗יו <S%H157><s%> and all his friends יַֽעֲשׂוּ־ <S%H6213><s%> be made עֵץ֮ <S%H6086><s%> unto him Let a gallows גָּבֹ֣הַּ <S%H1364><s%> high חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <S%H2572><s%> of fifty אַמָּה֒ <S%H520><s%> cubits וּבַבֹּ֣קֶר ׀ <S%H1242><s%> and to morrow אֱמֹ֣ר <S%H559><s%> speak לַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> thou unto the king וְיִתְל֤וּ <S%H8518><s%> may be hanged אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> מָרְדֳּכַי֙ <S%H4782><s%> that Mordecai עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> on וּבֹֽא־ <S%H935><s%> thereon then go עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> with the king אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמִּשְׁתֶּ֖ה <S%H4960><s%> unto the banquet שָׂמֵ֑חַ <S%H8056><s%> thou in merrily וַיִּיטַ֧ב <S%H3190><s%> pleased הַדָּבָ֛ר <S%H1697><s%> And the thing לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> accept הָמָ֖ן <S%H2001><s%> Haman וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> to be made הָעֵֽץ׃ <S%H6086><s%> the gallows פ
